document.full_text: ivory coast president alassane ouattara said no exceptions would be made in punishing those responsible for rights abuses, a pledge that will lead to close scrutiny of his forces' actions during its recent war.
document.title: ouattara says no exemptions in search for ivorian justice
lines_and_colors: ivory coast president alassane ouattara said no exceptions would be made in punishing those responsible for rights abuses, a pledge that will lead to close scrutiny of his forces' actions during its recent war.
